articles.title: Windfall tax on diesel, jet fuel exports cut further - The Economic Times
articles.description: It removed the ₹4 per litre levy on aviation turbine fuel exports. The new rates will be effective from August 3. The levy on petrol exports was removed in the July 19 revision.
